title: A Warning Everyone Needs to Hear About Biden (Ep 1312)
description:
In this episode, I address the disturbing information I received from a source about the rapidly deteriorating condition of Joe Biden. I also address the latest troubling incident in the liberal culture war on America. 

News Picks:

Liberals have turned their cities over to the mob. 


Liberal policies are killing people in American cities. Here’s what’s happening in Portland.

Sources are telling me that Joe Biden’s mental capacities are rapidly deteriorating.

Minneapolis police department tells residents to give in to criminals. 


Disturbing footage shows the moment police violently drag off a grieving father from his dying six year old daughter. 


Portland rioters burn Bibles in front of the cameras. 


Parents are erupting in anger in Maryland because liberal politicians are trying to shut their schools down.
